lead_paragraph: Cologne's chief of police dismissed claims of racial profiling Sunday after officers detained hundreds of North African men in an effort to prevent a repeat of sexual assaults during New Year's festivities in the German city a year ago.
snippet: Cologne's chief of police dismissed claims of racial profiling Sunday after officers detained hundreds of North African men in an effort to prevent a repeat of sexual assaults during New Year's festivities in the German city a year ago....

headline.main: Cologne Police Chief Rejects 'Racial Profiling' Claim
headline.print_headline: Cologne Police Chief Rejects 'Racial Profiling' Claim
